title: TPACK-Based Simulation Courseware Design for Art and Technology Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Artistic Creation Experience
context.additional_context: Providing real-time feedback through VR simulations using personal digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more digital art production techniques (line art, texturing, lighting design) in a VR environment.
Learners can design art education scenarios integrating technological, pedagogical, and content knowledge according to the TPACK framework.
Learners evaluate the artistic quality (composition, color, expression) of simulation productions at an average score of 4 or higher (out of 5) through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
